iron_furnace_speed.comment:
Number of ticks to complete one smelting operation.
 200 ticks is what a regular furnace takes.
 Default: 160

silver_furnace_speed.comment:
Number of ticks to complete one smelting operation.
 200 ticks is what a regular furnace takes.
 Default: 140

crystal_furnace_speed.comment:
Number of ticks to complete one smelting operation.
 200 ticks is what a regular furnace takes.
 Default: 40

Number of ticks to complete one smelting operation.
 200 ticks is what a regular furnace takes.
 Default: 40

Number of ticks to complete one smelting operation.
 200 ticks is what a regular furnace takes.

Number of ticks to complete one smelting operation.

copper_furnace_speed.comment:

furnaceXPDropValue.comment:
This value indicates when the furnace should 'overload' and spit out the xp stored. 
 Default: 10, Recipes

furnaceXPDropValue2.comment:
This value indicates when the furnace should 'overload' and spit out the xp stored. 
 Default: 100000, Single recipe uses

energy_usage.comment:
This value determines how much energy used per smelted item in the wireless heater. 
 Default: 250

enable_click_area.comment:
Enables or disables the click area in the furance gui for REI.
 Default: true

enable_catalysts.comment:
Enables or disables the recpie catalysts in REI.
 Default: true
